title: Evidence-Based Multimedia Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Self-directed learning utilizing multimedia resources in a smartphone-based LMS (Learning Management System) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design video lectures explaining mathematical concepts by applying the ten principles of multimedia learning
Learners can evaluate interactive learning materials (quizzes, simulations) optimized for smartphone environments
Learners can provide feedback to improve multimedia instructional design by analyzing formative assessment results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
